import re

def detect_special_sequences(input_string):
    pattern = ''
    match = re.fullmatch(pattern, input_string)
    return match is not None

import re

def detect_special_sequences(input_string):
    pattern = '^[a-z0-9]*@[a-z0-9]*$'
    match = re.fullmatch(pattern, input_string)
    return match is None
